subject: added support for onChange report
commitMessage:
added support for onChange report

Report is now notified when metric changes and updates reading values.

Tested:
  - Added new unit tests
  - OnChange report updates Readings when metric values changes

Change-Id: I3be9ef7aa0486cb15bac627aa1de5cc632613b3b
Signed-off-by: Krzysztof Grobelny <krzysztof.grobelny@intel.com>

Looks great, just few minor details.
I don't think there is timescope which currently is not unsupported? If you remove default clause, we would have compile time protection for non-handled TimeScopes.
This could be changed to method. It would come useful once change to writable properties is merged.
